uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.fileIO

Class FileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.fileIO.FileIO

  • public class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Exports/imports entire project to file using data retrieved from all ClassDiagData & RelationshipDiagData objects stored in VectorOfDrawables in XML format.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (???), Craig Hepinsthall (???)
